mapper.insert: insert into comments ( id, articlescrap_id, comment_name, comment_id, ip_address, comment, comment_time, parent_id, is_show ) values ( #{id}, #{articlescrap_id}, #{comment_name}, #{comment_id}, #{ip_address}, #{comment}, #{comment_time}, #{parent_id}, #{is_show} )
mapper.select: select id, articlescrap_id, comment_name, comment_id, ip_address, comment, comment_time, parent_id, is_show, c_desc from comments where articlescrap_id=#{articlescrap_id} order by comment_time desc limit #{beginNum},#{onePageSize}
select count(1) from comments where articlescrap_id=#{articlescrap_id}
mapper.update: update comments set is_show = #{is_show},c_desc=#{c_desc} where id = #{id}
